title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing leprosy or a gecko in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gecko or a gecko in a dream, especially since seeing this animal in a dream is considered one of the terrifying visions that worry many people, and of course it carries many repercussions that vary depending on the details of the dream, and the situation in which we see a gecko in a dream, whether it is walking on the wall or on the body, whether Whether it was small or large, in this article we will explain in detail the interpretation of the dream of seeing a gecko or gecko. In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing leprosy or a gecko in a dream. There are many scholars who have unanimously agreed that seeing leprosy in a dream is an unpleasant vision, especially since leprosy is a jinn and is one of the animals that is considered scary in a dream. Here we meet the interpretation of a dream about seeing leprosy or a gecko in a dream. The dream is also: If one sees a leper in a dream, this indicates the presence of a person close to that person, who deviates from the path of truth. In addition, it indicates a transition to evil and love of evil. In the event that one sees a leper in a dream on the walls of his room. This vision It is a sign of someone close to him, who is always cursing him and reminding him of evil. In addition to seeing a leper in a dream and the dreamer spitting on his body or near him. This is evidence of this person’s illness and God is All-Knowing of it. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a haila in detail by the most famous interpreters. Abu’s vision A gecko in a dream for a married woman... Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gecko. It is worth noting that this dream about a married woman usually includes those meanings and signs that convey evil to the ruler, and God is supreme over him, and in this context we will explain to you an interpretation. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a married woman is also: in case A married woman saw a leprosy or a gecko in a dream. This is evidence that there are many difficult problems between her family and a lack of understanding in her home. Because these problems are either related to money or to the husband. In addition, if a married woman dreams that she is killing lepers or that she is running and killing geckos This vision is evidence that this visionary will be free of problems and worries. It shows that he will be able to repay debts and will have many good things. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sacrifice in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of seeing fear and escaping from geckos in a dream from It is known that the stomach is one of the animals that is harmful to humans, and seeing it in a dream has many connotations that are often bad and not good and vary according to the scenes we see in the dream. In this context, the interpretation of seeing fear and escaping from geckos in a dream is also: It is worth noting that fear of geckos in a dream Evidence of burning fear. It also indicates a lack of ability and weakness in front of the person who will unleash it. This is evidence of the dreamer’s weak faith. If one sees in a dream that he is chasing the crowd in a dream without fear, then he will be arrested. It is stated that he will pursue the instigator until the fire is extinguished. title: Interpretation of a dream about my brother throwing stones at me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my brother throwing stones in a dream. Many people ask about what dreams mean, and below we present the interpretation of my brother’s dream of me throwing stones in a dream and more..Interpretation of a dream about my brother throwing stones at me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother throwing stones in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing stones in a dream could be evidence of someone who wants to harm the dreamer, and God knows all that no one has seen. If the dreamer sees stones being thrown in a dream, this may indicate hostility, and God knows the unseen. If a woman sees A married woman in a dream throws stones, as this may lead to a lack of love, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream throwing stones, it can express hostility and hardship, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my brother wearing my clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother wearing my clothes in a dream, perhaps he wears my clothes It will lead to disagreements between them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream wearing her clothes, this may be a sign of her inability to make a decision, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees in a dream someone wearing modest and spacious clothes, this may be evidence of his religiosity and faith. And God knows everything. If the dreamer sees someone wearing his clothes in a dream, this may be evidence of his participation in some work, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a brother wearing a formal suit in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother wearing a formal suit in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing yourself wearing a suit in a dream could be a sign of changes for the better, and God knows everything. If the dreamer sees himself wearing a suit in a dream, this may indicate achieving his goals that are approaching, and God knows everything. No one saw him. If the dreamer sees himself wearing an old suit, it may lead to illness, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my brother who was dreaming. Interpretation of dreams about my brother who was dreaming and the girl was beautiful. It can lead to goodness and happiness, and God is All-Knowing. If an unmarried young man sees his brother getting engaged to a beautiful girl in a dream, this may be evidence of his ability to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees that his brother has gotten engaged, this may be a sign of sustenance and money. God willing, if the dreamer sees his brother engaged to an ugly girl, this may express worry and distress, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams: My brother divorced his wife and married another woman in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: My brother divorced his wife and married another woman in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing the divorce of relatives in a dream could be a sign of envy, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a divorce of her relatives, this may lead to hatred and envy among her relatives, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the divorce of relatives in A dream may be evidence of the interference of relatives, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother who stole my car in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother who stole a car

title: Interpretation of seeing an explosion in one dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a person’s dream in detail. In fact, explosions are considered a frightening event, which leaves a bad impact on many people, and thus causes a lot of damage, perhaps materially or to lives. Therefore, when seeing the explosion in a dream, fear creeps into Ali. Vision, to search for an explanation for seeing an explosion in a dream, which is considered one of the bad dreams that a person can see that accompanies anxiety and panic. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is worth noting that the explosion carries with it many different interpretations, as interpretation scholars mention in interpretation books. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing an explosion is considered one of the frightening dreams through which fear creeps into a person. And the presence that is considered a bad dream: In fact, the interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream indicates the presence of problems with the dreamer. But if the explosion is seen in the dreamer’s house, it is a sign of celebrating happy news in the dreamer’s life. Therefore, hearing many explosions before The person with insight is a sign of the experiences that the dreamer is going through. Also, if the explosions stop, it is a sign of the end of troubles and sorrows and the coming of relief, God willing. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing apples in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul. Interpretation of seeing the explosion in a single woman’s dream. Also, seeing the explosion indicates The upcoming danger in the life of the person with the vision. That's what people think. For this reason, the interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream is carefully researched, which explains the following: Accordingly, seeing an explosion in a single girl’s dream indicates that she has something on her mind. But if an unmarried girl sees an explosion occurring in her house, this is evidence of Her imminent marriage. Therefore, the explosion in an unmarried girl’s room is a sign of happiness and joy that will enter her life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a louse in the hair and its effects. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for a married woman and a pregnant woman. In fact, the explosion is considered one of the events that leave a bad impact on Life, and causes various disasters and losses of life and property, so seeing an explosion in a dream carries many interpretations that could be bad, according to what he says. Referenced in interpretation books: Therefore, seeing an explosion in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the marital problems she is suffering from. On the other hand, the explosion of bombs in her house is an indication of the worsening of the existing problems between her and her husband. But if she is exposed to harm, this is a sign of her separation from Her husband. Also, the interpretation of seeing an explosion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date is approaching. In addition to seeing a bomb in a dream that did not explode, this means that she will be exposed to some problems during pregnancy and her birth will be delayed. See also: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of Hearing The sound of an explosion in a dream, in addition to the interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about food in a dream

preview.html: Eating in a dream is one of the dreams that many people have and it arouses their curiosity to know the interpretation of this dream. Some of us dream that we are eating vegetables, and some of us dream that we are eating fruits, and many others. Types of meat foods. In fact, food of all kinds is an essential element for human survival from water and helps us grow from birth, but it is possible that this dream is evidence of our desire for a certain type of food or conveys to us another interpretation; through an encyclopedia, you can You see the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about eating in a dream and what that means for married, pregnant and unmarried women. Interpretation of food in a dream by Ibn SirinEating food in general is good and nutritious for the pioneer, and there are many cases in which Ibn Sirin interpreted food in a dream as follows: Whoever sees in In a dream, eating food makes him feel pleasure and happiness, then this is evidence in reality that what he desired has been achieved. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating sweets, this is a sign of his happiness in reality. And if he eats delicious and delicious food, this is his interpretation of what he wants and in reality, and its interpretation as well. It is based on the fortuneteller’s good reputation. If the dreamer finds that he is eating slowly, this has many interpretations, the most important of which is that it shows that he makes decisions in his real life carefully, or it means psychological balance or contentment and contentment. In reality. In the event that you only see food without eating it, this indicates kindness and nourishment for the owner of the vision. If the dreamer is hungry and cannot eat in the dream, then this is interpreted in reality as needing the help of those around him. In the event that the owner of the vision is poor Eating in a dream indicates his faith in the world and his satisfaction. If you see burnt food in a dream, this is his interpretation of the fear and tension that controls the dreamer, in addition to his emotional deprivation. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating a pumpkin, this indicates that he is following the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Peace be upon him. If you eat peaches in a dream, this indicates something good will happen to the dreamer. And whoever sees that he is eating unhealthy food, this indicates the death of blessings in reality. If the dreamer finds in a dream delicious food and does not eat it, this indicates that he will not succeed in Reality. Interpretation of food in a dream for a married woman. Seeing eating in a dream for a married woman indicates a lack of emotional feelings. If a married woman finds in a dream a table with many types of food, this is interpreted as being happy with her husband in reality. Seeing a married woman eating means that she does not feel safe. In reality. Whoever sees in her dream that she is eating alone, this indicates that there are problems between her and her husband in reality. Interpretation of food in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is eating delicious food, this is her interpretation in reality that anxiety has ended and the vagina is approaching in reality. Seeing a pregnant woman eating food in a dream means that she will give birth in reality. Interpretation of food in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating food at a wedding, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big house with many rooms

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for single people: When an unmarried girl sees in her dream a big house with many rooms. This is evidence of the imminent marriage of this girl to a good man with good qualities. He has great wealth and a high status, and God knows best. Seeing a two-story house with many rooms in a dream An unmarried girl is evidence that this girl will move to a new stage in the near future, whether it is her personal life, such as her marriage, or her professional life, such as moving to a new job. The interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms in an unmarried woman’s dream is that she will live a stable life. And happy. With a new person proposing to her, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a large house and many spacious rooms, this is evidence that many things will happen. For this girl the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees a large and spacious house in her dream, then this girl is also in Test period. This may indicate the success of this girl in the exam. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of a dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of a large house and many rooms for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a large house full of rooms, this may be evidence of her desire Women. In seeking forgiveness and repentance for sins and drawing closer to God Almighty. The interpretation of a dream about a large house and many rooms in a married woman’s dream is that this woman can move to a new stage. In her personal life, such as pregnancy, or in her professional life, such as obtaining a good job. If she A married woman dreams that she is moving to a new, spacious house with many rooms. This may be a bad omen of some problems between her and her husband in the near future. Whereas if a woman sees in a dream that she is moving to a new, large house, and in reality she does so. This is a sign of love. Her husband is intense for her. Seeing a large house with many rooms in a married woman’s dream is evidence of that woman’s upcoming livelihood. If a married woman sees a large and spacious house in a dream, this is evidence that this woman. She is very satisfied with her life, her husband, and her children. When she sees A married woman in her dream is that she enters a large and spacious house with many rooms. This is good news for him to get rid of all the crises and difficult circumstances that he is going through. Seeing an excessively large and spacious house in a married woman’s dream is evidence that that woman’s life will be much better than it was. Therefore. If a married woman sees in a dream a large and spacious house, and in reality she is a sick woman. This dream is a good omen for her recovery, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a large and spacious house falling and falling, this may be a bad omen. A sign of the death of one of her family members. If a married woman sees in her dream a large and spacious house, but it is old. It indicates this woman’s old worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a large house and many rooms for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream a large house with many rooms, this is evidence of her birth. Easy and safe for her and her child. God willing

When she sees A married woman in her dream is that she enters a large and spacious house with many rooms. This is good news for him to get rid of all the crises and difficult circumstances that he is going through. Seeing an excessively large and spacious house in a married woman’s dream is evidence that that woman’s life will be much better than it was. Accordingly. If a married woman sees in a dream a large and spacious house, and in reality she is a sick woman. This dream is a good omen for her recovery, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a large and spacious house falling and falling, this may be a bad omen. A sign of the death of one of her family members. If a married woman sees in her dream a large and spacious house, but it is old. It indicates this woman’s old worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a large house and many rooms for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream a large house with many rooms, this is evidence of her birth. Easy and safe for her and her child. God willing

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother cutting my hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother cutting my hair in a dream. The mother is the most important person in everyone's life and she always takes care of them and cares about the lives of her children and their appearance. One of the sons may see his mother cutting his hair in a dream, depending on the person's condition and the details of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother cutting my hair in a dream If a girl sees her mother cutting her hair in a dream, this means that the mother stands by her daughter in all matters of her life. When she sees a mother cutting her daughter's hair, this is a sign that the mother wants to make her daughter better off, God willing. As for if the young man sees his mother cutting his hair in a dream, this indicates his need for his mother's presence and tenderness. If he sees that his mother is cutting his hair and that his hair is beautiful in a dream, this indicates guidance, success and success in the decision made, God willing. The seer may see his mother's hair cut in a dream, and her hair has become ugly. Expresses his regret for his decisions and his dissatisfaction with the interference in his life affairs, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream Seeing short hair in a dream can be interpreted as getting rid of sadness, tension and problems surrounding him, God willing. When a girl sees in her dream a pot cutting her hair, this is a sign of the tension and problems she suffers from in her life and is trying to get rid of. If the hair is dirty and the hair is in her dream, this is good news to get rid of the worries and problems surrounding her in her life, God willing. When a married woman sees her hair being cut in a dream, this is good news about her upcoming pregnancy and birth, God willing. Cutting hair in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates getting rid of the problems and pains of pregnancy. As for a man, if he dreams of cutting his hair, this means that he will increase his income and search for a new source of livelihood and work with all his energy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair by a familiar person in a dream If a girl sees that someone she knows is cutting her hair, this is evidence that she will marry soon, and it is possible that he will propose to her, and God knows best. The doctrine of a married woman is that the one who cut her hair is her husband, warning of the problems that may arise between them and lead to divorce And separation. When a married man sees his wife cutting his hair in a dream, this indicates the presence of love and respect between the spouses. As for if a girl cuts her hair for herself in a dream, she will get rid of a love relationship that is limited to her and does not benefit her, and open a new page in her life in which she is good and happy, God willing. And if someone cuts his hair in his dream, this is a warning of problems that may affect a family member, and he must stand by him until he gets rid of problems and worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair and crying in a dream If a girl sees in her dream that she is crying because of cutting her hair, this is a warning of health problems in her life and she must go to the doctor and not neglect her health, and God knows best. He can cut hair in a dream without the girl's desire and she is crying. This indicates that there are things imposed on her and that she does them against her will, and that this represents pressure on her. And when a girl sees that she is the one cutting her hair and crying over it, it may be a bad vision for her, indicating the death of someone close to her and mourning for

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the moon near the Earth

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the moon near the EarthSeeing the moon in a dream is a common vision, but it has many interpretations that can bring good news and joy to the astronaut, and it can be a bad omen of trials and tribulations. Interpretation of a dream about the moon near the earth Commentators have given several indications of seeing the moon near From the earth in the fortuneteller’s dream and they are as follows: If an unmarried woman sees the moon near the earth, this is a sign that she will marry a man who can make her happy. If the dreamer does not work and sees the moon near the earth in his dream, he will find a suitable job from which he will earn a lot of money in the future. Nearby. If a divorced woman sees in her dream the moon approaching the Earth, this is a sign of her second marriage and the provision of good offspring. Interpretation of the dream of the moon close to the Earth by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin suggested different interpretations of seeing the moon near the Earth, which are: If the dreamer sees the moon near the Earth In a dream, this is a clear indication of the dreamer’s ability to achieve all the desires and aspirations that occur in the near future. According to Ibn Sirin, if a person sees in a dream the moon close to the Earth and its size is large, then this is a sign of achieving unprecedented success in all fields. Interpretation of a dream The moon is near the Earth for single people. If an unmarried woman sees the full moon and her appearance is attractive, this is a clear indication of positive events that will happen to her and will cause her happiness in the near future. If the moon is incomplete in the dream of a separated girl, this is a sign that she will suffer from psychological pressures and crises that will prevent her from From living her life normally. Interpretation of a dream about the moon near the sea for a single woman: Seeing the moon falling into the sea has many meanings, the most important of which is: If the dreamer is a man and sees the moon falling into the sea, this is clear evidence that his life is full of worries and sorrow. A dream about the moon falling into the sea also symbolizes To the extreme horror and fear that grips the dreamer about the appearance of some things in his life. And if someone sees that the moon is falling into the sea or the mountain, this is a clear sign that he has entered into a failed romantic relationship. Interpretation of a dream about the moon near the earth for a married woman. There are many interpretations that It has been suggested by interpretation scholars to see the moon near the Earth in a married woman’s dream, such as: If a married woman sees the moon very close to the Earth in a dream, this is a clear indication of many obstacles, obstacles, and crises that she faces and cause her unhappiness and sadness. A married woman who sees the moon near her In a dream, it symbolizes the arrival of the good news that she wanted to hear, which is the provision of good offspring. If the dreamer sees the moon near the earth and its light is little, then this is a clear indication of poor financial conditions, and if the moonlight fills the earth, then her husband’s financial condition will recover and he will do much. Of money in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing the moon as a full moon for a married woman. If a married woman sees the moon in her dream, and it looks like a full moon, this is a sign that she will become pregnant.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white veil in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white veil. Interpretation of seeing a veil in a dream in general indicates a woman’s good reputation among people and her good biography. Seeing a long white veil in a dream indicates a great improvement and stability in a woman’s life and achieving goodness. Also, seeing a black veil in a dream means that there are some problems and difficulties. Which the dreamer is experiencing. Also, seeing bright colors on the veil in a dream is one of the visions that indicate happiness, pleasures, and relief from distress. Seeing a short veil in a dream means that this woman is failing in her duties to save her husband and children and she must take care of them. Interpretation of the white veil in a dream for a woman Single woman: Wearing a white veil in an unmarried woman’s dream is a praiseworthy vision that indicates happiness, pleasure, and relief from distress. Also, if an unmarried girl sees herself wearing a short veil in a dream and her hair appears, this indicates that she has committed major sins and sins. Seeing a white veil in a dream And its shape is beautiful and hidden for an unmarried woman, as this is good news and a sign of her diet for a close marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a white veil for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman removing her veil in a dream indicates that she will fall into misfortune because of her wrong actions. Seeing a married woman wearing a white veil in The dream means that she will receive good and abundant sustenance in her next life. Taking off the hijab in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the big problems that she will fall into, and an indication of divorce and obstacles in her life. The interpretation of seeing a woman tearing her hijab in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate her distance from God and her departure. About religion and religion and she must repent. Interpretation of a dream about a white veil for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a white veil in a dream is one of the visions that indicate her righteousness and that she will be blessed with the desired child, male or female. Wearing a beautiful and elegant white veil in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good omen and a sign. That she will go through an easy and trouble-free birth process. A veil in a dream in general without taking it off, tearing it, or seeing it worn is considered a desirable dream, otherwise it is an indication of unpleasant events. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will Reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing the President of the Republic in a dream for a son Calmness This is one of the unusual dreams that exposes his mind to tension, pressure and surprise as well and makes him search everywhere and in every possible way for the interpretation of this dream to reassure himself and reassure his heart. To see the President in a dream for a married woman. See the married woman being with the head of her state, as well as with Heads of other countries, while they are in her house, this dream is interpreted as many good things that will happen to her in the near future. And when she sees the President of the Republic happy to see her, and congratulates him on his happy news, this dream means that her wish will come true soon. To see the President in A dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that the President of the Republic is her husband himself, then this dream is interpreted as an easy birth for him and for him and his family to have a good and abundant diet. But if he sees this marriage to the President of the Republic, then this dream indicates her salvation from all the problems and crises that she has gone through, and this Which explains her high social status. When she sees the President of the Republic in a dream, this means that she is about to achieve her dreams and goals in life. But if she dreamed that she was next to the king, this dream explains her closeness to her Lord and a change in her condition for the better. Seeing President Sisi in a dream When I see you, President Sisi is smiling at you in your dream. This dream is interpreted as good and abundant food that will come to the dreamer, and it is also interpreted that in the days that follow the dream many good things will happen. And if you see President Sisi and eat food next to him, this dream is interpreted that he has a higher status than you and indicates your high status among the people. And society. This dream is also interpreted as showing that the dreamer is a person who is proud of his dignity and is proud of himself as well. To see the President of the Republic in a dream in an unmarried dream To see a free girl in her dream where she congratulates the President of the Republic, this dream shows that many good things will come to her. When she sees the President From afar, this dream indicates that she will fulfill her desires. And if you see that she is sitting next to her boss, but she is very afraid, then this dream will be interpreted as her anxiety about the future, but she will be fine again. To dream of a deposed president When you see a former president in a dream, this dream is interpreted as It says that you are very afraid of your situation and position. This dream also shows that you regret some of the actions you took and are trying to learn from the past and what happened there before it is too late. This dream is considered a warning to the dreamer to stop repeating the mistakes of the past, and the need to progress and improve for the better. To see a boss The Republic dead in a dream, explained by Ibn Shaheen A dream in which the late president sees a good and great livelihood for the dreamer. Seeing the grave of the late president This is interpreted in the dream as the dreamer being close to achieving his life’s dreams. If the dreamer sees that he is reviving a deceased president, then this dream will be interpreted as that he will travel to the near future to achieve great success And a lot of money. When the dreamer sees that he is sitting with a deceased president,
